name: tanstack-query
description: Manage server state in React with TanStack Query v5. Covers useMutationState (cross-component mutations), simplified optimistic updates, throwOnError for error boundaries, network mode (offline/PWA), useQueries combine, infiniteQueryOptions, and maxPages for memory optimization.
